reviewtext: Read all the reviews before buying it and had expected more.  But in reality I really should not have since I didn't pay too much for it.  The main thing that really dislike about it is that the collapsing mechanism isn't stiff enough and I find I have to make sure I'm putting it on with both hands or else the headphones will fold in.  Other than that I think it is okay.  I'm not much of an audiophile so I'll leave the sound quality and what not to those in the know.
